summary: This is a January 2019 bank statement from Municipal Credit Union for an account belonging to TOVA A NOEL of the Bronx, NY. It shows deposits, withdrawals, and loan activity, including transfers to/from JPMorgan Chase and various bill payments.

persons.name: Tova A Noel
persons.context: The individual whose name and address (Bronx, NY) appear on the bank statement summary. The account activity is for this person.

events.title: Bank Statement Period End
events.description: End of the statement period for the MCU account, summarizing all transactions for January 2019.

keyFacts: The document is a personal bank statement for Tova A Noel for January 2019.
The account shows a large deposit of $4,044.28 on January 29, 2019, from 'AGRI TREAS 310', which appears to be a federal salary payment.
A significant withdrawal of $1,715.62 was made on January 31, 2019, via an ACH transfer to JPMorgan Chase Bank.
The account holder also had a personal loan with a balance of $5,312.10 and an annual percentage rate of 10.5%.
The statement shows routine personal expenses including payments to Con Edison, Verizon, AT&T, Domino's Pizza, and parking fees.
